description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b4vd8","text":"The Chromium Single Cell Gene Expression Solution upgrades short read sequencers to deliver a scalable microfluidic platform for 3’ digital gene expression by profiling 500-10,000 individual cells per sample. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhvre","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qtjn","text":"Once cDNA is amplified, enzymatic fragmentation and size selection are used to optimize the cDNA amplicon size. P5, P7, i7 and i5 sample indexes, and TruSeq Read 2 (read 2 primer sequence) are added via End Repair, A-tailing, Adaptor Ligation, and PCR. The final libraries contain the P5 and P7 primers used in Illumina amplification.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1frpc","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dab75","text":"This protocol details the gene expression dual index library construction and sequencing.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bf4sk","text":"Store at   for up to   or at   for long-term storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3r88m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a432f","text":"Post Library Construction QC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ih9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8g7s5","text":"Run   sample at 1:10 dilution on an Agilent Bioanalyzer High Sensitivity chip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"utuj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c67f","text":"Determine the average fragment size from the Bioanalyzer trace. This will be used as the insert size for library quantification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn2bp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd8ke","text":"3’ Gene Expression Library Sequencing Depth \u0026 Run Parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7p7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g8lf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ugsp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["159","259"],"data":[["Sequencing Depth","Minimum 20,000 read pairs per cell"],["Sequencing Type","Pair-end, dual indexing"],["Sequencing Read","Recommended Number of cycles"],["Read 1","28 cycles"],["i7 Index","10 cycles"],["i5 Index","10 cycles"],["Read 2","90 cycles"]],"guid":"5BDA73A1B0ED4425A53FC370217DD4B1","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Sequencing Depth","Minimum 20,000 read pairs per cell"],["Sequencing Type","Pair-end, dual indexing"],["Sequencing Read","Recommended Number of cycles"],["Read 1","28 cycles"],["i7 Index","10 cycles"],["i5 Index","10 cycles"],["Read 2","90 cycles"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"be237","text":"Once quantified and normalized, the 3’ Gene Expression libraries should be denatured and diluted as recommended for Illumina sequencing platforms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
